DESCRIPTION: The next time you #yExhaust a card, enemy takes damage.
Hatred is an #yEthereal #yCurse that causes HP loss every turn.
Negates the next buff. Applied through #yArtifact.
Whenever you are attacked this turn, deal damage back.
#yUpgrade any #yHatred in your hand, then put ALL other #yHatred into your hand. If you have none, add a copy to your hand.
Look at the top X cards of your draw pile. You may discard any of them.
